Name: Pour Me Another
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Raisiny pedro ximénez sherry adds subtle richness to the cognac with hints of flavour from the absinthe and lemon zest. This drink benefits from generous dilution so consider adding a splash of water.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Noel Ekstrand at Astrum Grill & Raw Bar, Trondheim, Norway.
Nutrition: One serving of Pour Me Another contains 129 calories
